alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 05 at 7:24PM MST until January 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest TO west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be very difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Interstate 25 from Las Vegas to Raton will be impacted and closures are possible.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
